channel.title: Host of The Linux Lemming on The Linux Lemming
channel.description: Recent content in Host of The Linux Lemming on The Linux Lemming

item.title: RastaCalavera
item.description: I’ve been hammering on Linux since 2002, but I’ve been serious about using it since 2009. I’ve always been a desktop user and only got into server side linux in 2014. KDE and XFCE are my main desktop environments and I primarily run an Ubuntu base (although I do try Arch variants once in a while.) Since getting into server side linux, I’ve really focused on self-hosting simple things. This was, and still is, a steep learning curve for me.
